Shadow_Punch.help: You charge up your fists with negative energy before punching a nearby foe. The target suffers negative energy and smashing damage, as well as a reduced chance to hit.
Shadow_Punch.targetHelp: Your chance to hit has been reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

Smite.help: You charge up your fists with negative energy and unleash a powerful attack on a nearby foe. The target suffers negative energy and smashing damage, as well as a reduced chance to hit.
Smite.targetHelp: Your chance to hit has been reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

Dark_Blast.help: You fire concentrated negative energy at a single target. The target suffers negative energy damage and a reduced chance to hit.
Dark_Blast.targetHelp: Your chance to hit has been reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

Shadow_Maul.help: You wrap your arms with negative energy before striking out with a series of blows that deal smashing and negative energy damage to nearby targets in front of you. These blows also cloud your target's vision, lowering their chance to hit.
Shadow_Maul.targetHelp: Your chance to hit has been reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage over time.

Dark_Regeneration.help: You channel negative energy into your target in order to drain a small amount of life from all enemies nearby, healing yourself with the drained essence. The more foes affected, the more you will be healed.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

Placate.help: You trick a foe into dropping their attack focus on you. When successful, you will also be hidden for a short time.

messages.victimHit: You have been placated and cannot target {PlayerSource}.
You have been placated and cannot target {PlayerSource}.

Aura_of_Fear.help: You wrap yourself in a nightmarish aura of fear. Foes close to you are treated to visions most horrific, forcing them to tremble in terror, only attacking if attacked, and even then, with a reduced chance to hit.

Midnight_Grasp.help: You form negative energy into dark tentacles that can immobilize a foe, reducing their chance to hit and continuously drain their life force in the form of negative energy damage.
Midnight_Grasp.targetHelp: You have been immobilized and your chance to hit has been reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.
